text: Versace S.p.A, usually called Versace, is an Italian luxury fashion house.Singapore Clothing and Textile Industry Handbook (Washington DC: USA International Business Publications, 2009), p. 71 It was founded by Gianni Versace in 1978. One of the logos of the brand represents the head of Medusa. Since the death of Gianni Versace in 1997, Donatella Versace is the head of designs. Her daughter Allegra Versace owns half of the company. ==References== Category:1978 establishments in Europe Category:Italian fashion houses Category:Companies based in Milan Category:1970s establishments in Italy
title: Versace
